originalPrerequisite: High-school calculus and a score of 80% or higher in BC Principles of Mathematics 12 or Pre-calculus 12.
blacklistReason: The prerequisite 'High-school calculus' cannot be represented unambiguously using the provided type system.  There is no way to represent 'High-school calculus' using the available Requirement types (RequirementGroup, RequirementCourse, RequirementCreditCount, RequirementCourseCount, RequirementStanding, RequirementProgram, RequirementPermission, RequirementOther).  It requires an external definition or a more flexible 'RequirementOther' type with more metadata to specify the high school course.
